document_data.mainbody:
uldail Ukien was a ranger of Thorngap during the late 15 century DR.
Kuldail had sandy-blonde hair and pale skin. He wore a gray tunic and dark leggings, and favored a bow.
Under the influence of Halsaimes staff, Kuldails personality was devoted to destroying all possible opposition to the concept of nature.
Kuldail Ukien and his giant spider companion Skitter defended the Druids Deep for the druid Halsaime, who had used his staff to subvert the local druids, rangers, and wild creatures. He was joined in this service by the fierce druid Juhni.
